6620/A0/05/006/004.indicator_name: Share of the national budget allocated to social sectors
6620/A0/05/006/004.headline: UNICEF Comoros  started to advocate with the Directorate of budget at the central level to obtain exchange of financial data and subsequently strengthen cooperation with this department.  The availability of budgetary information for 2016  provided a solid basis for an improved public finance management framework in Comoros.
